author: kalgiz
body: In some tests the comparisons between objects, types, checks if the file exists etc. are written in Powershell (-eq -ge ...) and just the result is verified with -BeTrue -BeFalse Pester parameters. We should move the check logic into Pester to receive better information in case of failure.
title: Clean up test code to move the check logic into Pester and avoid using Should -BeTrue/-BeFalse
